testcase.name: Search product on flipkart and save the price
testcase.system-out: Given User launch firefox browser...........................................passed Then User open url "https://www.flipkart.com/"..............................passed Then User search for product "Oneplus 13"...................................passed Then User click on one plus13 product.......................................passed Then User get the price of the product......................................passed Then User save the price in excel sheet with the time.......................passed Then User close the browser.................................................passed
